    Change the type of the cell of a known position in the ArrayList cells
    void followPath​(Rider r, int n)
    Allow to move the rider of several cases according to his path First it checks what player has to move since they don't have the same path Then while the rider hasn't moved of the number of cell he has it checks where it is and move it to the next cell

    void init()
    Initialize the board Put CellWhite where the players doesn't go CellFree where they can go CellSide around the board Cell start and CellStable of each players CellRiver, CellHole and CellHedge according to the board we where given in class Then calculate where the CellFinish of each player will be
    void move​(Rider r, Position from, Position to)
    Move a rider from a cell to another Checks if the new position is valid then move the rider to it

      Constructor of board

      public int getCols()
      Getter of the number of columns of the board

      the number of columns

      public int getRows()
      Getter of the number of rows of the board
      Returns:
      the number of rows

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(Position p)
      Getter of a cell of the board
      Parameters:
      p - the position of the cell we want
      Returns:
      The cell

    • getCellType

      public char getCellType​(Position p)
      Getter of the type of a cell of the board Uses getCell
      Parameters:
      p - the position of the cell we want
      Returns:
      The character indicating the type of the cell

    • getRedEnd

      public Position getRedEnd()
      Getter of the position where the red rider end the race
      Returns:
      The end position of red

    • getBlueEnd

      public Position getBlueEnd()
      Getter of the position where the blue rider end the race
      Returns:
      The end position of blue

    • init

      public void init()
      Initialize the board Put CellWhite where the players doesn't go CellFree where they can go CellSide around the board Cell start and CellStable of each players CellRiver, CellHole and CellHedge according to the board we where given in class Then calculate where the CellFinish of each player will be

    • changeCell

      public void changeCell​(char symbole, Position from)
      Change the type of the cell of a known position in the ArrayList cells
      Parameters:
      symbole - Allows to know the new type of the cell
      from - The position of the cell to change

    • move

      public void move​(Rider r, Position from, Position to)
      Move a rider from a cell to another Checks if the new position is valid then move the rider to it
      Parameters:
      r - The rider we want to move
      from - The position of the rider
      to - The position where the rider will be moved

    • followPath

      public void followPath​(Rider r, int n)
      Allow to move the rider of several cases according to his path First it checks what player has to move since they don't have the same path Then while the rider hasn't moved of the number of cell he has it checks where it is and move it to the next cell
      Parameters:
      r - The rider we want to move
      n - The number of cases

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(Rider r1, Rider r2)
      Allows to represent the board of the game shows the players and all the specials cells
      Parameters:
      r1 - The first player
      r2 - The second player
      Returns:
      A String modeling the board
